data.event: Gawler Plains Post Office opened on 12 July 1850 and was renamed Smithfield in 1855.
Gawler Plains Post Office opened on 12 July 1850 and was renamed Smithfield in 1855.

event.title: was built in the Smithfield area in 1926

data.event: A 1 mile (1.6 km) speedway track was built in the Smithfield area in 1926 by the Motorcycle Club of South Australia.
The first meeting was scheduled for Wednesday 13 October 1926, but postponed to Saturday 16 October due to poor weather.
The first meeting was scheduled for Wednesday 13 October 1926, but postponed to Saturday 16 October due to poor weather.
